detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#12)
	- ETGFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#63-65)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:

	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#13)

	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#14)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:

	- ETGFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#81-86)

	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#16)
	- ETGFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#75-79)

	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SafeMath__2.sol#32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
